snippet: The space agency suspended contact except over operations of the International Space Station, underscoring the rapid deterioration of ties in the wake of the Kremlin’s annexation of Crimea.
abstract: NASA is suspending most contact with Russian space agency officials, underscoring the rapid deterioration of Russian-American ties in the wake of the Kremlin’s annexation of Crimea.

byline.original: By KENNETH CHANG and PETER BAKER

lead_paragraph: The space agency suspended contact except over operations of the International Space Station, underscoring the rapid deterioration of ties in the wake of the Kremlin’s annexation of Crimea.

headline.main: NASA Breaks Most Contact With Russia
headline.print_headline: NASA Breaks Most Contact With Russia
